title: Hello, I‚Äôm Aaron Rosales!
text:
About This Website
This site was built as part of my IBM 3202 coursework to showcase my resume, project experience, and interests in the fields of sports, marketing, and digital media.

title: Digital Marketing
text:
This section highlights my hands-on experience in digital marketing and content development, especially within the sports and athletic performance space. I‚Äôve collaborated with nationally recognized organizations and built campaigns that prioritize growth, engagement, and creative alignment with target audiences.
Below are selected areas that showcase how I apply strategy, design, and analytics to build strong digital presence and campaigns.



I‚Äôve worked on developing sports-centered content strategies and growing digital platforms from the ground up, helping reach thousands of users through original video and trend-based media.
Highlights: - Grew a sports performance page to over 100,000 followers across Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube
- Scheduled and published consistent high-engagement content including game footage, training tips, and reactions
- Researched trends and optimized post timing for reach and algorithmic performance
- Collaborated with athletes and brands for promotional campaigns
Skills Demonstrated: - Trend analysis & algorithm adaptation
- Short-form content planning and scripting
- Platform-specific optimization (Reels, Shorts, TikToks)
- Community management and comment engagement




Partnered with brands such as Perfect Game and Baseball Factory on digital initiatives, helping to align content with their brand tone, audience, and goals.
Highlights: - Integrated branded content into educational and entertainment-focused videos
- Maintained visual consistency using templates and design tools like Canva
- Balanced audience interests with sponsor expectations
- Helped increase visibility for smaller baseball-related startups and gear brands
Skills Demonstrated: - Brand-aligned messaging
- Visual content creation using Canva & CapCut
- Influencer-brand negotiation and campaign execution
- Multi-brand content scheduling and delivery




Beyond publishing, I focused on learning what worked and what didn‚Äôt ‚Äî analyzing insights to adjust content style, timing, and strategy.
Highlights: - Used TikTok and Instagram Creator Studio dashboards to assess content performance
- Adjusted content categories based on viewer retention and interaction metrics
- Applied learning across channels to improve average reach, watch time, and click-throughs
Skills Demonstrated: - Metrics interpretation (engagement rate, impressions, saves, etc.)
- Strategic content reshaping
- A/B testing of different content styles and hooks
- Hashtag and caption optimization


My digital marketing experience is grounded in real-world execution, performance tracking, and learning-by-doing ‚Äî helping me grow as both a content creator and strategist in fast-moving digital spaces.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 1: Strategic Campaign Planning]
In this project, I led the development of a comprehensive marketing campaign for [product, service, or initiative]. From audience segmentation to messaging strategy, I managed the full lifecycle of the campaign, aligning it with business objectives and measurable KPIs.
Skills Demonstrated:

Marketing Strategy: Defined objectives and tactics for maximum impact.
Team Coordination: Oversaw collaboration across creative, data, and channel teams.
Performance Tracking: Implemented real-time metrics and post-campaign analysis.
Brand Positioning: Ensured consistency across all touchpoints.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 2: Brand Audit & Positioning]
This initiative involved conducting a full brand audit for [organization or brand], evaluating its current market perception, competitive landscape, and customer engagement. I synthesized insights into a refreshed brand strategy and visual identity recommendations.
Skills Demonstrated:

Brand Analysis: Audited messaging, tone, and visual identity.
Competitive Benchmarking: Evaluated brand positioning within the market.
Strategic Communication: Developed new value propositions and storytelling elements.
Stakeholder Presentation: Delivered recommendations to senior leadership.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 3: Product Launch Go-to-Market Plan]
For the release of [new product/service], I created a go-to-market (GTM) strategy from scratch. This included customer journey mapping, channel mix planning, and launch timeline coordination.
Skills Demonstrated:

Go-to-Market Strategy: Developed a clear launch roadmap aligned with buyer needs.
Integrated Marketing: Orchestrated email, paid ads, social, and on-site promotions.
Budget Management: Allocated resources efficiently across tactics.
Launch Optimization: Tracked performance and refined tactics in real time.

Below is an embedded demonstration of the interactive report:

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 4: Client Consulting & Campaign Optimization]
I collaborated with a client to assess and optimize their existing marketing efforts. Through audits, persona development, and campaign refinement, I helped improve ROI and audience engagement.
Skills Demonstrated:

Client Consulting: Provided clear insights and strategic guidance.
Persona Development: Built target personas to guide messaging.
Campaign Optimization: Identified and addressed areas of underperformance.
Data-Driven Adjustments: Leveraged analytics to refine tactics.

title: Professional Summary
Marketing Analytics
text:
This section highlights my experience using marketing analytics to better understand audiences and support smarter decisions. My work blends data interpretation with real-world application, helping turn raw numbers into useful insights that drive impact.
From campaign breakdowns to trend spotting, I‚Äôve applied my skills to uncover what really matters‚Äîwhether that‚Äôs in digital spaces, customer behavior, or brand engagement.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
What You‚Äôll Find

Performance Analysis: Looking at how digital efforts are landing, what‚Äôs working, and what‚Äôs not.

Visual Storytelling: Creating charts and dashboards that make complex data easier to act on.

Channel Insights: Understanding which platforms are pulling weight and contributing to outcomes.

Behavioral Trends: Using analytics to break down how people interact, respond, and convert.


Note: Project-specific examples have been withheld to respect data privacy and confidentiality.

title: Social Media Engagement Analysis
text:
Overview
This analysis examined engagement metrics across multiple social media platforms to identify content trends, audience preferences, and posting strategies that drive performance.




Learning Outcomes

Aggregate and clean social media data.

Identify high-performing content formats.

Understand audience behavior and peak times.

Support social strategy with data-backed recommendations.

Visualize results in an executive summary.




Key Skills Gained

Social analytics

Platform metric APIs

Content performance tracking

Audience insights

Strategic planning

title: Sports Analytics
text:
My experience with analytics goes beyond traditional marketing ‚Äî I‚Äôve used data and tech tools to help athletes improve performance, optimize throwing mechanics, and better understand how their bodies move. This work combines biomechanics, pitch analysis, and high-level player development strategies.




Rapsodo & Trackman: Used for collecting pitch tracking data, including velocity, spin rate, spin axis, and pitch movement

Driveline Motion Capture: Applied biomechanics tools to analyze throwing efficiency and joint sequencing

Baseball Savant & FanGraphs: Researched pro and college-level pitchers to break down performance metrics and trends






Analyzed countless pitchers from high school to pro using data from Rapsodo, Trackman, and Savant

Studied pitch movement profiles, vertical approach angles, release points, and arm slot data

Helped athletes understand how their body moves and how to better coordinate their mechanics for max velocity and efficiency

Designed personalized throwing plans and training cues based on motion capture and pitch feedback

Educated athletes on using their data to track progress and stay healthy





Understanding the intersection of analytics and physical performance is what sets modern athletes apart. I use data not just for analysis ‚Äî but for action: helping pitchers improve how they move, throw, recover, and perform.

My background bridges the gap between numbers and movement ‚Äî blending data-driven insights with real athletic outcomes.

title: Pitch Movement Profiling
text: Used advanced tracking tools to break down vertical approach angle, release height, and spin direction. These insights helped design athlete-specific throwing plans.

title: Pro Scouting Analysis
text: Studied pitch usage, extension, arm slot, and spin rates to better understand elite-level patterns and help guide athlete development in training settings.

title: Motion Capture Mechanics
text: Captured kinematic data on arm action, hip-shoulder separation, and joint angles. Helped translate this into coaching cues and training progressions.

title: Pro Scouting Analysis
text: Studied pitch usage, extension, arm slot, and spin rates to better understand elite-level patterns and help guide athlete development in training settings.

title: Motion Capture Mechanics
text: Captured kinematic data on arm action, hip-shoulder separation, and joint angles. Helped translate this into coaching cues and training progressions.

title: Marketing Funnel Attribution Model
text:
Overview
This project developed a marketing attribution model to assign credit to touchpoints throughout the conversion journey. The insights supported channel optimization and budget reallocation.




Learning Outcomes

Track multi-touch customer journeys.

Model attribution using first-touch, last-touch, and linear approaches.

Visualize funnel performance.

Quantify channel impact on conversion.

Guide future campaign investment decisions.




Key Skills Gained

Attribution modeling

Funnel analysis

Data visualization

Campaign performance analysis

R or Python analytics pipelines

title: SEO Benchmarking Analysis
text:
Overview
This project compared SEO performance across competitors, highlighting keyword gaps, backlink profiles, and content effectiveness. Insights were used to guide an improved content and SEO strategy.




Learning Outcomes

Identify keyword opportunities through competitive research.

Track and compare domain authority and page rankings.

Recommend on-page SEO improvements.

Design a data-driven SEO content strategy.

Visualize competitor positioning.




Key Skills Gained

Keyword research

Web scraping & data cleaning

SEO analysis tools

Data storytelling

Strategy development

title: Campaign Insights Dashboard
text:
Overview
This project involved building a dashboard to track and visualize marketing campaign performance. Metrics like click-through rate, conversion rate, and ROI were tracked across channels using R and Tableau.




Learning Outcomes

Visualize and monitor key marketing metrics.

Analyze performance trends across multiple campaigns.

Identify high- and low-performing segments.

Communicate insights through interactive visuals.

Develop data-informed recommendations.




Key Skills Gained

Dashboard development

Campaign analytics

Data wrangling in R

Tableau or R Shiny visualization

Performance measurement

title: Customer Segmentation Using Clustering
text:
Overview
In this analysis, customer data was segmented using clustering algorithms to identify meaningful groups. These segments informed targeting strategies and personalization efforts.




Learning Outcomes

Clean and prepare customer-level data.

Apply clustering techniques to group similar customers.

Interpret clusters to define marketing personas.

Recommend tailored messaging strategies.

Support targeted campaign development.




Key Skills Gained

K-means clustering

Data preprocessing

Customer profiling

Market segmentation strategy

R or Python for machine learning
